sources.title: Face of Terror
sources.description: “Predictable, mildly interesting” “Horror of facial repair, Mexican style” (IMDB reviews quotes). A psychological suspense thriller/horror which adds an insane patient to the usual mad scientist yarn. Lisa Gaye and Fernando Rey costar. Good production values for type. This is an English language film, however in some scenes the English is dubbed. IMDB rating 5.8. Directed by I M Ferry and William J Hole Jr. Released in 1962. Complete print. AKA “La Cara del terror”

metadata.Plot: A Los Angeles police officer travels to Spain in search of his sister who disappears in Barcelona after pursuing a modeling career. A trail of drugs and corruption lead him to a terrorist cell that has been using American girls as human bombs. Will his sister be next?
metadata.Writer: Douglas L. Walton, Brent Huff, Robert Tiffe
metadata.Actors: Ricky Schroder, Paulina Gálvez, Eric Balfour
